overview: Roger Barry has been the Managing Partner of IVF since its inception in 1994. During this period, he has invested in 68 private companies, including Salesforce.com, NBCI/Xoom, Netlogic Microsystems, AdECN, Persistence Software, and Tut Systems. Roger served as General Partner of a NewVista Fund from 1997 to 2004, and was a General Partner of Crosspoint Venture Partners for nine years prior to forming IVF. Roger was a partner at KPMG (Peat Marwick) prior to Crosspoint, and began his career with Bankers Trust Company and First Boston Corporation. Roger has a Masters in Business Administration (M.B.A.) and was a Certified Public Accountant (C.P.A.)
